scripts.minify:css: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const css=fs.readFileSync('dist/oc-ui.css','utf8'); const min=css.replace(/\/\*[\s\S]*?\*\//g,'').replace(/\s+/g,' ').replace(/\s*([{}:;,])\s*/g,'$1').trim(); fs.writeFileSync('dist/oc-ui.min.css',min); console.log('CSS minified')"
scripts.minify:js:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const js=fs.readFileSync('dist/oc-ui.js','utf8'); const min=js.replace(///.*/g,'').replace(//\*[\s\S]*?\*//g,'').replace(/
\s*
/g,'
').replace(/\s{2,}/g,' ').trim(); fs.writeFileSync('dist/oc-ui.min.js',min); console.log('JS minified')"
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.fullbuild: npm run build && npm run minify
scripts.release: npm run fullbuild && git add . && git commit -m 'Release v$npm_package_version' && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
